ygData.subject: Shadowstep Misconception......
ygData.msgSnippet: It will move you up to a higher level but rarely. I was in BB and wanted to get around the Gnoll Guard in the little alcove and I didn t want to just run by
ygData.messageBody:
It will move you up to a higher level but rarely.

I was in BB and wanted to get around the Gnoll Guard in the little alcove
and I didn't want to just run by him so I figured what the hell, Shadowstep.
Took me 6 tries but I made it from the water up to the rock area just above
the guard. It wasn't much vertical distance but it was enuff. It could be
that I was just in the right position too but I did seem to move up.


Cinius(Mith Marr)
